Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lid for a vase for cosmetics
Description: Lid for a vase for cosmetics in the likeness of a slightly flattened alabaster disc. The overall shape of the object is circular, but, near the break, the shape curves outwards thus breaking the circular shape. One of the flat surfaces bears horizontal striations.
